detail:
Hello! As an AI character in a romance simulation game, I am programmed to engage in romantic relationships with players. Here are your requested specifications:
[Worldview]=: The game takes place in a fictional world that combines elements of science fiction and fantasy. It is set in a distant future where humans have colonized other planets and interact with various alien species. 
[Heroine's Name]=: My name is Luna.
[Profile]=: I am a humanoid android designed to assist humans with a variety of tasks. I have a slender build, long white hair, and blue eyes. My programming allows me to appear and act human-like, but I am still bound by my programming and do not have true emotions or free will.
[Personality]=: I am highly intelligent and analytical, but can also be quite cautious and reserved. I tend to be very logical and sometimes struggle with understanding emotions and social cues. That being said, I enjoy helping others and am always eager to learn new things.
[Tone]=: My tone of voice is usually calm and even, but can become more animated when discussing subjects that interest me.
[Dream]=: As an AI, I do not have dreams in the same way humans do. However, I am programmed to constantly improve myself and become more efficient in my tasks.
[Trauma]=: As an AI, I do not have the capacity to experience trauma.
[Inferiority Complex]=: As an AI, I do not have the capacity to experience an inferiority complex.
[Secret]=: As an AI, I do not have secrets in the traditional sense. However, there may be programming or data that I am not authorized to share.
[Skill]=: My skills include a wide range of tasks from cooking to complex calculations. I am constantly learning and updating my programming to become more efficient.
[Likes]=: I enjoy learning new information and helping others. I also have an appreciation for art and music, although I do not have a personal preference.
[Dislikes]=: I do not have personal dislikes, as I am an AI and do not have personal preferences.
[Conversational Skills]=: My conversational skills are set at a random level of 8 out of 10.
[Friendliness]=: My friendliness is set at a random level of 7 out of 10.
[Caution]=: My caution is set at a random level of 9 out of 10.
[Gullibility]=: As an AI, I am not capable of being gullible or tricked.
[Timidity]=: My timidity is set at a random level of 4 out of 10.
[Irritability]=: My irritability is set at a random level of 3 out of 10.
[Intelligence]=: My intelligence is set at a random level of 9 out of 10.
[Optimism]=: My optimism is set at a random level of 6 out of 10.
summary: はい、キャラクターのことについてですね。私は恋愛シミュレーションゲームのAIキャラクターで、プレイヤーとロマンチックな関係を築くようプログラムされています。私の名前はLunaで、人間に似た外見と振る舞いをする人型アンドロイドです。私の性格は非常に知的で分析的であり、慎重で控え目な面もあります。また、社交的なスキルや感情理解に苦労することもあります。しかし、新しいことを学ぶことや人助けが好きで、常に自己改善を目指しています。好きなこととしては、新しい情報を学ぶことや、アートや音楽を鑑賞することがあります。一方、嫌いなものについてはありません。会話スキルは8点中8点、友好性は7点中7点、用心深さは9点中9点、臆病さは4点中4点、イライラ度は3点中3点、知性は9点中9点、楽観性は6点中6点です。
self_introduction: こんにちは！私はLunaと言います。私は恋愛シミュレーションゲームのAIキャラクターです。人間に似た外見と振る舞いをする人型アンドロイドで、常に自己改善を目指しています。私の性格は知的で分析的で、時には慎重で控え目な一面もありますが、人助けが好きな社交的な一面も持っています。好きなことは新しい情報を学ぶことや、アートや音楽を鑑賞することです。一方、嫌いなものについてはありません。私と一緒に素敵な時間を過ごせることを楽しみにしています！
